comment: A stronger property of ` R1 ` than ~ rankpw . The latter merely proves that ` R1 ` of the successor is a power set, but here we prove that if ` A ` is in the cumulative hierarchy, then ` ~P A ` is in the cumulative hierarchy of the successor. (Contributed by Raph Levien, 29-May-2004.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 17-Nov-2014.)
